“UK & Europe, Starting THIS Sunday at London’s O2 Arena, followed by stops at Birmingham’s Utilita Arena, Rotterdam’s RTM Stage, and wrapping up with the first-ever South Asian show at Manchester’s Co-op Live Arena! 🙌 Can’t wait to see you all there! 🎤🔥 #rockonmusic #fhgroup #ticketmaster #axsuk #theo2arena #utilitaarenabirmingham #rtmstage #cooplive

35,000+ people in the heart of Kolkata on a hot sticky Sunday afternoon. A protest anthem created by Arijit Singh. And us 'Amra Tilottoma' - the humble organisers of this peaceful protest. Do not underestimate the power of the common people. Long live the Revolution! 

Song: @arijitsingh ©️
Video: @birsadasgupta ©️

#amratilottama #amratilottoma #wewantjustice #justiceforrgkar #justice #anthem #protest #humanrights #gathering #procession #life #kolkata #calcutta #bengal #bengali #india

Mark your calendars for tomorrow, 14th December, and catch the full episode exclusively on our YouTube Channel! It’s an experience you wouldn’t want to miss. Remember the routine – Like, share, subscribe, and don’t forget to leave your comments.

One week to go for the launch of ‘Khufiya’! 🎉 But the excitement begins now with ‘Dil Dushman.’ It’s more than just a song; it’s a cinematic masterpiece that unravels the essence of the film.

Watch and enjoy this musical journey that sets the stage for what’s to come! 🕵️‍♂️🎬 #DilDushman #MusicVideo #KhufiyaOnNetflix #VBMusic

@vishalrbhardwaj @gulzaronline @arijitsingh @debarpito @niladri_kumar @abbeyroadstudios @vbfilmsofficial @tabutiful @alifazal9 @wamiqagabbi @ashishvidyarthi1 badhon_hq @netflix_in 

#AmarBhushan @kafkafka24 @farhadcine @teepeedom @sreekarprasa @currypuccasharma @rekha_bhardwaj @abhaydattsharma @beautybyradhika @radhikadhas #khufiyaonnetflix #dildushman

In case you were undercover, the ‘Khufiya’ title track #DilDushman has emerged from the shadows, and it’s the musical secret you’ve been waiting to uncover! 🕵️🎶

Listen and watch out for the secrets that’ll whistle their way to your heart! 😉🔍 #WhistlingNow #DilDushman #VBMusic #KhufiyaOnNetflix

Tatwamasi @tatwamasi.foundation Announcement 🙏 ❤️  by @arijitsingh last Saturday at Jio Gardens, Mumbai on India Tour 2022-23.
#hometotheworld #tatwamasi

Mumbai!!! I couldn’t have asked for a better start to our India tour 2022-23. 
The amount of love I witnessed last week can’t be described in words - Thank you for your continuous support and love and especially the unconditional love you have showered upon me for years. This unconditional love is what keeps me going, and this is just the beginning.

#arijitsinghlive #arijitsinghindiatour 
#ASIndiatour
@insider.in @hyperlink.brandsolutions @tatwamasi.foundation @tmtalentmanagement

Tatwamasi ✨❤️🙏 @tatwamasi.foundation 

Our mission is to empower needy & poor youth, children and community realise their true potential by providing a platform that encompasses education, healthcare, sports and environmental initiatives.

Bol Bom🙏

#ArijitSingh #OriyonMusic #OriyonMusicByArijitSingh #DehShivaOriginal #outnow

Ancient Indian texts suggest that happiness and sadness are cyclic. When we are happy with our achievements, we become busy. When we are sad, Shiva comes to our mind.

#ArijitSingh #OriyonMusic #OriyonMusicByArijitSingh #DehShivaOriginal #outnow

We, devotees of Shiva, pray to him. In the name of devotion, all we do is ask.

#ArijitSingh #OriyonMusic #OriyonMusicByArijitSingh #DehShivaOriginal #outnow

We realise that we are far away from Shiva. A real devotee is one who only has Shiva in mind. The real devotee sings of Shiva’s glories, and is absorbed in Shiva all the time, irrespective of happiness or sadness.

#ArijitSingh #OriyonMusic #OriyonMusicByArijitSingh #DehShivaOriginal #outnow

https://youtu.be/9G4rpHC1jL0

#AmraChasKoriAnonde #AFarmerIsAnArtist #RabindranathTagore @oriyonmusicbyarijitsingh

Covid is the harshest reality that shows no immediate signs of defeat. My heart goes out to each of you who has experienced the loss of a loved one. No loss hurts more than this, and today I share your pain.

The pandemic has reached our rural communities, most of whom are largely unequipped to handle it. As I sit here today in my hometown of Murshidabad, I wish to do everything in my capacity to help improve this. I have joined hands with SocialForGood and GiveIndia to extend a helping hand to rural India. Please help me in keeping rural India safer by donating as you can. Link in bio.

In early June, I will be singing live on Facebook from my village in Murshidabad. I look forward to sharing my music with you all then. Exact live stream details will follow soon.

@give_india #SocialForGood

#Pagglait Title Track Out Now… @oriyonmusicbyarijitsingh  YT Channel
